Keywords: Avengers , Codex , Defenders , Midnight Sons , Monster , Mystical
Real Name: Stephen Strange
Special Powers
TARGETING: This character can make range attacks while adjacent to opposing characters. (May target adjacent or non-adjacent opposing characters.)
SUMMON HELP FROM THE VENOMVERSE: When Venom Dr. Strange hits an opposing character, if no character has been placed this turn, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 3-6: Choose a character on your sideline whose name includes "Venom" of equal or less points to place adjacent. This game that character can't be carried, replace, or be replaced, and returns to your sideline at the beginning of your next turn.
SYMBIOTE: Plasticity, Shape Change.
IT WAS MY DECISION TO BRING YOU ALL TOGETHER: Leadership, Probability Control.

The character is also from the Marvel Contest of Champions game. But it goes by the name Symbiote Supreme.
September 21, 2020
wizard2778
no he’s not from venomized. i found out he is just a promotional design of venom dr strange from the spider man cartoon. there event was called maximum venom, all the venomized heroes in this set are from the cartoon. the dice have the logo from the cartoon and the fast forces packaging shows spider-man from the show.
September 20, 2020
vamroc
I believe that Venom Doctor Strange is from the Poison crossover arc which saw Venom battle parasites that infest symbionts, destroy the mind of the host, and allow the symbiont to obtain greater power at the expense of allowing this creature to influence it's actions to a degree. The Poison were an interdimensional race with a hive mind that conquered many universes before Venom Captain America assembled other Venoms from across the multiverse. 616 Eddie was the last person on Venom Cap's list of recruits after a big fight with the Poisons Brock vanishes not knowing what happened to the other Venoms (were some goofy ones). But meat of the story was when the Poisons invade Earth because we get to see All New X Men with Symbionts, Poison Doom, Poison Thanos, and Poison Hulk. SERIOUSLY they ran around firing "tee shirt cannons" full of symbionts so the Poison hatchings could then bond to the symboint and take over the host.

September 13, 2020
machineman
Not only does this Doc have typical Dr. Strange stuff going on, he’s got the SS+SC double roll avoidance going, plus, he’s an unlimited call-in card for all 90 pt or less venom-people You just need to hit somebody first. One of my favorite of a string of really nice Mystic Arts Masters we’ve gotten lately.
